column2: No bastard ever won a war by dying for his country. He won it by making some other poor dumb bastard die for his country.  -General George S. Patton

Welcome to Total War.  An Expansion Game for BLACK ICE.  The Game Guide can be downloaded seperately for this mod on the HOI 3  BLACK ICE Forum.  This is a highly complex simulation game that will require a lot of skill by the player.  If this is your first time playing, it is recommended that you play on the lowest difficulty settings.  You will find Total War to be an immersive and complicated playing experience.  Thank you for downloading this mod and good luck!
